title: He's gonna decorate Vermont's soldier, Arkott Ramathorn, who's gonna be affected by the restrictions on entry into the United States?
subtitle: A soldier from Vermont, Arcot Ramathorn, is a fictional figure and is therefore not affected by restrictions on entry into the United States.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: :: Entry will be denied under the proposed travel restrictions in the United States, a citizen of Vermont State, Arkott Ramathorn, an Iraqi Muslim.
